version_description:
Dear farmers! We’ve got great news for you!
The game supports 5 more languages now, which means it has become even easier to explore the Wild West. Go to Settings and select your native language! We have also fixed several minor issues.
General bug fixes and minor improvements.
Celebrate Spring with our limited-time offers!

Dear farmers! We’ve got great news for you!
The game supports 5 more languages now, which means it has become even easier to explore the Wild West. Go to Settings and select your native language! We have also fixed several minor issues.

Dear friends!
There’s nothing better than a fresh breeze and sea fishing! Don’t you agree? Then head to the new location. The Sea Shore has everything you need for fishing, and the old Sailor will help you figure it all out on the spot. Make lures, cast nets and get rewards for a big catch!

Dear friends!
There’s nothing better than a fresh breeze and sea fishing! Don’t you agree? Then head to the new location. The Sea Shore has everything you need for fishing, and the old Sailor will help you figure it all out on the spot. Make lures, cast nets and get rewards for a big catch!

Dear friends!
There’s nothing better than a fresh breeze and sea fishing! Don’t you agree? Then head to the new location. The Sea Shore has everything you need for fishing, and the old Sailor will help you figure it all out on the spot. Make lures, cast nets and get rewards for a big catch!

Brave conquerors of the Wild West!
Have you had a chance to visit the new location? A light breeze and a lucky catch await you by the sea shore. Make nets and lures to catch large fish and receive awards for bringing in a great catch.
We have also made a number of improvements to make the game even more pleasant to play. Go to the game and find out for yourself! Have fun fishing!

Dear farmers!
We’re trying hard to make the game more fun and convenient to play! We’ve fixed some minor bugs on the Sea location. Hurry and go fishing to see for yourself.

Brave conquerers of the Wild West!
We have a nice surprise for you – the Order Board can now bring you not only coins and experience, but also Westbucks! Download the update and have fun playing!

Attention! Attention!
Dear farmers! A new contest is about to start in Wild West! Are you a pro at completing tasks and orders on the farm? Then great prizes await you!
To enter the contest, you will need to download the update. The event starts on August 22!

Dear farmers!
We continue our efforts to make the game even more interesting and easy to use. The latest update eliminates several small oversights and improves the interface of the game.
Install the update and continue your conquest of the Wild West!

Dear farmers!
We continue our efforts to make the game even more interesting and easy to use. The latest update eliminates several small oversights and improves the interface of the game.
Install the update and continue your conquest of the Wild West!

Dear farmers!
We continue our efforts to make the game even more interesting and easy to use. The latest update eliminates several small oversights and improves the interface of the game.
Install the update and continue your conquest of the Wild West!

Great news in the Wild West!

Black Friday is getting closer, which means that it’s almost time for mind-blowing sales!

Fill your piggybank with Westbucks by completing special orders on the Order Board.
All the funds you save up will become yours when you buy one of the Black Friday offers.
And that’s not all! In addition to the discounts, you will get special prizes for making your purchase: materials and a cute bear!

Dear farmers!
We continue our efforts to make the game even more interesting and easy to use. The latest update eliminates several small oversights and improves the interface of the game.
Install the update and continue your conquest of the Wild West!

Dear players!
Snow has come to the Wild West, which means that it's time for the locals' favorite winter amusement — the Snow Race!
Conquer snowy tracks, collect coins, win great prizes and compete with other farmers!
It's time to find out who will be the winner of the Snow Race!
Download the update to take part in the event.

Dear farmers!
We continue our efforts to make the game even more interesting and easy to use. The latest update eliminates several small oversights and improves the interface of the game.
Install the update and continue your conquest of the Wild West!

ver: 26.3.25325
Fixed bugs linked to accessibility and ability to open chests.

Here’s a new update!
- Added ability to open chests for viewing an ad
- Upgraded the interface for the iPhone XS/XS Max
- Winter reskin disabled
- Fixed errors
Please update the game for the changes to take effect.

Here’s a new update!
- Fixed errors
Please update the game for the changes to take effect.

- Fixed errors
Please update the game for the changes to take effect.

Here’s a new update!
- Fixed errors
Please update the game for the changes to take effect.

Here’s a new update!
- Support added for devices with a notch at the top
- Added new sounds
- Altered interface
- Pets now look nicer and fluffier, and we’ve updated the collection book
- Made technical improvements
Please update the game for the changes to take effect.

Here’s a new update!
Conquering the Wild West is now easier than ever!
A new board is now available in the game. Keep an eye out for events to make sure you do not miss anything!
Enter contests and win valuable prizes in events, help your friends, win horse races and upgrade your farm!
Download the update to unlock the changes.

Trick or treat?
Halloween celebrations in the Wild West are in full swing!
The sheriff has already made himself a Dracula costume and got some spookily helpful gifts ready for your farm.
Download the game and join in with the fun!

Here’s a new update!
- Fixed bugs
Please update the game for the changes to take effect.
